00002 #
00003 #  Implement multiplication.
00004 #
00005 package Parser::BOP::multiply;
00006 use strict;
00007 our @ISA = qw(Parser::BOP);
00008 
00009 #
00010 #  Check that operand types are compatible for multiplication.
00011 #
00012 sub _check {
00013   my $self = shift;
00014   return if $self->checkStrings();
00015   return if $self->checkLists();
00016   return if $self->checkNumbers();
00017   my ($ltype,$rtype) = $self->promotePoints('Matrix');
00018   if ($ltype->{name} eq 'Number' && $rtype->{name} =~ m/Vector|Matrix/) {
00019     $self->{type} = {%{$rtype}};
00020   } elsif ($ltype->{name} =~ m/Vector|Matrix/ && $rtype->{name} eq 'Number') {
00021     $self->{type} = {%{$ltype}};
00022   } elsif ($ltype->{name} eq 'Matrix' && $rtype->{name} eq 'Vector') {
00023     $self->checkMatrixSize($ltype,transposeVectorType($rtype));
00024   } elsif ($ltype->{name} eq 'Vector' && $rtype->{name} eq 'Matrix') {
00025     $self->checkMatrixSize(Value::Type('Matrix',1,$ltype),$rtype);
00026   } elsif ($ltype->{name} eq 'Matrix' && $rtype->{name} eq 'Matrix') {
00027     $self->checkMatrixSize($ltype,$rtype);
00028   } elsif ($self->context->flag("allowBadOperands")) {
00029     $self->{type} = $Value::Type{number};
00030   } else {$self->Error("Operands of '*' are not of compatible types")}
00031 }
00032 
00033 #
00034 #  Return the type of a vector as a column vector.
00035 #
00036 sub transposeVectorType {
00037   my $vtype = shift;
00038   Value::Type('Matrix',$vtype->{length},
00039      Value::Type('Matrix',1,$vtype->{entryType},formMatrix => 1),
00040      formMatrix =>1 );
00041 }
00042 
00043 #
00044 #  Do the multiplication.
00045 #
00046 sub _eval {$_[1] * $_[2]}
00047 
00048 #
00049 #  Remove multiplication by one.
00050 #  Reduce multiplication by zero to appropriately sized zero.
00051 #  Factor out negatives.
00052 #  Move a number from the right to the left.
00053 #  Move a function apply from the left to the right.
00054 #
00055 sub _reduce {
00056   my $self = shift;
00057   my $reduce = $self->{equation}{context}{reduction};
00058   return $self->{rop} if $self->{lop}{isOne} && $reduce->{'1*x'};
00059   return $self->{lop} if $self->{rop}{isOne} && $reduce->{'x*1'};
00060   return $self->makeZero($self->{rop},$self->{lop}) if $self->{lop}{isZero} && $reduce->{'0*x'};
00061   return $self->makeZero($self->{lop},$self->{rop}) if $self->{rop}{isZero} && $reduce->{'x*0'};
00062   return $self->makeNeg($self->{lop}{op},$self->{rop}) if $self->{lop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'(-x)*y'};
00063   return $self->makeNeg($self->{lop},$self->{rop}{op}) if $self->{rop}->isNeg && $reduce->{'x*(-y)'};
00064   $self->swapOps 
00065      if (($self->{rop}->class eq 'Number' && $self->{lop}->class ne 'Number' && $reduce->{'x*n'}) ||
00066         ($self->{lop}->class eq 'Function' && $self->{rop}->class ne 'Function' && $reduce->{'fn*x'}));
00067   return $self;
00068 }
00069 
00070 sub makeNeg {
00071   my $self = shift;
00072   $self = $self->SUPER::makeNeg(@_);
00073   $self->{op}{noParens} = 1;
00074   return $self;
00075 }

00077 $Parser::reduce->{'1*x'} = 1;
00078 $Parser::reduce->{'x*1'} = 1;
00079 $Parser::reduce->{'0*x'} = 1;
00080 $Parser::reduce->{'x*0'} = 1;
00081 $Parser::reduce->{'(-x)*y'} = 1;
00082 $Parser::reduce->{'x*(-y)'} = 1;
00083 $Parser::reduce->{'x*n'} = 1;
00084 $Parser::reduce->{'fn*x'} = 1;

00086 sub string {
00087   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00088   my $string; my $bop = $self->{def};
00089   $position = '' unless defined($position);
00090   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00091   my $extraParens = $self->context->flag('showExtraParens');
00092   my $addparens =
00093       defined($precedence) && !$self->{noParens} &&
00094       ($showparens eq 'all' || (($showparens eq 'extra' || $bop->{fullparens}) && $extraParens > 1) ||
00095        $precedence > $bop->{precedence} || ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00096         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || ($showparens eq 'same' && $extraParens))));
00097   $outerRight = !$addparens && ($outerRight || $position eq 'right');
00098 
00099   $string = $self->{lop}->string($bop->{precedence},$bop->{leftparens},'left',$outerRight).
00100             $bop->{string}.
00101             $self->{rop}->string($bop->{precedence},$bop->{rightparens},'right');
00102 
00103   $string = $self->addParens($string) if $addparens;
00104   return $string;
00105 }

00107 sub TeX {
00108   my ($self,$precedence,$showparens,$position,$outerRight) = @_;
00109   my $TeX; my $bop = $self->{def}; my $cdot;
00110   $position = '' unless defined($position);
00111   $showparens = '' unless defined($showparens);
00112   my $mult = (defined($bop->{TeX}) ? $bop->{TeX} : $bop->{string});
00113   ($mult,$cdot) = @{$mult} if ref($mult) eq 'ARRAY';
00114   $cdot = '\cdot ' unless $cdot;
00115 
00116   my $addparens =
00117       defined($precedence) && !$self->{noParens} &&
00118       ($showparens eq 'all' || $precedence > $bop->{precedence} ||
00119       ($precedence == $bop->{precedence} &&
00120         ($bop->{associativity} eq 'right' || $showparens eq 'same')));
00121   $outerRight = !$addparens && ($outerRight || $position eq 'right');
00122 
00123   my $left  = $self->{lop}->TeX($bop->{precedence},$bop->{leftparens},'left',$outerRight);
00124   my $right = $self->{rop}->TeX($bop->{precedence},$bop->{rightparens},'right');
00125   $mult = $cdot if $right =~ m/^\d/ ||
00126      ($left =~ m/\d+$/ && $self->{rop}{isConstant} &&
00127       $self->{rop}->type eq 'Number' && $self->{rop}->class ne 'Constant');
00128   $right = '\!'.$right if $mult eq '' && substr($right,0,5) eq '\left';
00129   $TeX = $left.$mult.$right;
00130 
00131   $TeX = '\left('.$TeX.'\right)' if $addparens;
00132   return $TeX;
00133 }
